A Plague Tale: Innocence.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
A Plague Tale: Innocence.description: During the Black Death, Amicia must protect her brother Hugo from the Inquisition while uncovering the truth behind his mysterious illness and surviving deadly swarms of rats.

A Plague Tale: Requiem.title: A Plague Tale: Requiem
A Plague Tale: Requiem.description: Amicia and Hugo flee their plague-ravaged homeland to find a cure for Hugo's curse. As his powers grow, a new wave of supernatural rats threatens to engulf the world.

Alan Wake 2.title: Alan Wake 2
Alan Wake 2.description: Writer Alan Wake and FBI agent Saga Anderson uncover a nightmarish mystery that blurs reality and fiction, as they confront a supernatural darkness linked to Bright Falls.

Assassins Creed : Odyssey.title: Assassins Creed : Odyssey
Assassins Creed : Odyssey.description: Set during the Peloponnesian War, the game follows Kassandra or Alexios, a Spartan mercenary, as they uncover their familys secrets and influence the fate of ancient Greece. Players engage with mythological creatures, historical figures, and make impactful choices in an epic open-world adventure.

Assassins Creed : Origins.title: Assassins Creed : Origins
Assassins Creed : Origins.description: Set in ancient Egypt, the game follows Bayek, a Medjay, as he seeks revenge for his son's death and becomes one of the founding members of the Assassin Brotherhood.

Black Myth: Wukong.title: Black Myth: Wukong
Black Myth: Wukong.description: Inspired by Journey to the West, players control the Destined One, a monkey warrior with transformative abilities, in a mythological world filled with fantastical creatures and legends.

Control.title: Control
Control.description: Jesse Faden explores the Federal Bureau of Control to find her brother and uncovers a reality-bending threat known as the Hiss. With supernatural powers and shifting environments, she must take control.

Death Stranding.title: Death Stranding
Death Stranding.description: Courier Sam Porter Bridges must reconnect isolated cities across a fractured America after a cataclysmic event, facing supernatural threats and delivering hope in a world of isolation.

Ghost of Tsushima.title: Ghost of Tsushima
Ghost of Tsushima.description: Jin Sakai becomes the Ghost, abandoning samurai honor to wage guerrilla warfare against Mongol invaders in 13th-century Japan, balancing tradition with necessary rebellion.

God of War (2018).title: God of War (2018)
God of War (2018).description: Kratos and his son Atreus journey across the Norse realms to fulfill a final wish, battling gods and monsters while confronting their painful past and strengthening their bond.

Hellblade II : Senua's Saga.title: Hellblade II : Senua's Saga
Hellblade II : Senua's Saga.description: Set in the 1800s, you play a custom student at Hogwarts with a rare ability to wield ancient magic. Explore the wizarding world, uncover dark secrets, and shape your magical legacy.

Hogwarts Legacy.title: Hogwarts Legacy
Hogwarts Legacy.description: Aloy travels to the Forbidden West to uncover the source of a deadly plague, encountering new tribes and robotic creatures in a lush post-apocalyptic world.

Horizon: Forbidden West.title: Horizon: Forbidden West
Horizon: Forbidden West.description: Peter Parker must protect New York from Mister Negative and other classic villains while balancing his personal life, relationships, and the responsibilities of being Spider-Man.

Marvel's Spiderman Remastered.title: Marvel's Spiderman Remastered
Marvel's Spiderman Remastered.description: Leon S. Kennedy is sent to rescue the President's daughter from a cult in a remote village, uncovering a sinister parasite and battling nightmarish foes in a reimagined horror-action classic.

Resident Evil 4 : Remake.title: Resident Evil 4 : Remake
Resident Evil 4 : Remake.description: Lara Croft journeys to Siberia in search of the lost city of Kitezh and the secret of immortality, battling the militant group Trinity while embracing her destiny as the Tomb Raider.

Rise of the Tomb Raider Reemastered.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider Reemastered
Rise of the Tomb Raider Reemastered.description: Senua returns in a brutal journey through mythic Iceland, battling both human enemies and the voices of psychosis within her mind, as she seeks vengeance and peace.

Silent Hill 2 Remake.title: Silent Hill 2 Remake
Silent Hill 2 Remake.description: James Sunderland receives a letter from his deceased wife, calling him to the eerie town of Silent Hill, where he confronts his grief and inner demons in a psychologically charged horror experience.

The Last of Us Part I.title: The Last of Us Part I
The Last of Us Part I.description: In a post-apocalyptic U.S., Joel escorts Ellie, a girl immune to a deadly infection, across the country. Along the way, they form a deep bond amid constant threats and hard moral choices.

The Witcher 3 (Next Gen).title: The Witcher 3 (Next Gen)
The Witcher 3 (Next Gen).description: Geralt of Rivia searches for his adopted daughter Ciri while battling the spectral Wild Hunt in a war-torn world filled with monsters, politics, and moral ambiguity.
